title: Missing Worlds Missions?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So uh.... my only Worlds Mission is to complete 4, and I'm at 3/4... is this just because there's no more or a glitch?

replies.body: Same problem.  NO missions just the 3/4 mission.
Looks like you might have completed 2 missions right at the same time which kinda messed things up a bit. I've poked that mission a bit, relog if you can and you should see it update!
I'm also having this problem. Is this happening to everyone?
Hello, same issue here :) could you pleas do the same for me? I wanted to open a ticket but this sounds easier.
Hi, I'm having the same problem. Could u take a look into it or should I send a support ticket for my region separately? Thanks!
